```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)

IEs_raw <- read_csv("Data/ier-records.csv") 

IEs  <- clean_names(IEs_raw) %>% 
  mutate(id = as.character(id))

IEs_north_america <- IEs %>% 
  select(id, dep, continent, country, status) %>% 
  filter(continent == "North America") %>%
  # filter(is.na(dep)) %>% 
  filter(status == "Published")
  # summarise(id_count = n_distinct(id))
  # filter(id == "4505") 



```
